data.text: Khawa phakhan Reng Herod in koisuok mi lekkhat minpoong-minraalna aleiphutjei.
Halli ama'n John upa James kha chemma atukthat jei.
Ama'n khawa itho khan Jihudi ngai malung ataijei ti amu phakhan, Peter um ama'n aminsurjei. Khawa kha chol inchelmak waipool bakna kahoi phakhan aleisuok.

Halli ama'n Peter kha asurpha, mikhumna khan ada-ah, raalmi mili mili in rupmili suok-ah amakha ngaaknasik aleipeii. Ajarchu Herod in Jihudi ngai rakaanna kahoi suoli amakha mi ngai maikuungnga keisuo sik-ah aleingaidon. Suok 12:1-27
Khawa jarra Peter mikhumna khan inleida, takkha amasik bit-ah koisuok mi ngai'n Pathian diang malung kaluut ah inleinipi.
Herod in Peter kha mipui maikuungnga akeisuosik ni zaan takkhan, raalmi inni ngai kongkarra Peter kha thirrui inniya inkhit-ah aleizaal, halli raalpa ngaikhan mikhumna kotkhan inleingaak.

Enro, Pumi tirton inkhat in akoolla angir jei, halli war inkhat in mikhumna innsuung kha awarjei, marwaan tirton khan Peter darkhoi kha kanik ah akeithei li ati, “Innot-ah intheiro!” khawapha takkhan akut-ah inkhit thirrui kha atajei.
Marwaan tirton khan amadiang ati, “Nakoongkhit kha inkhittro, halli nakekok chuongro.” Peter in khawatak kha athojei, halli ama'n ati, “Napuon sil-inlang kei naheijuiro.”
Halli ama'n aheisuok ah anuk aleijui jei, khat-um marwaan tirton ithokha inthiangtak eii ti jetleiya ama'n mangtalar inkhat kimu eii tia aleingaidon.

Inmani'n ma-insa khat-um inni changna kot kangaak ngaikha inheikheella, khuopui inheiluutna thirkot kha inheitung, halli innkhar kha atheinuo ah alei-inlongjei, halli inmani inheisuok ah, lampui khan inheiwa, halli jetlei-theileiya marwaan tirton in Peter kha ada-ah asijei.

Peter in apumtak ah akasuok kha ajet-ah ati, “Tuunchu kei'n inthiangnga kajetjei, tichu, Pumi'n ama tirton anajuotirpiya, keihi Herod kut-ah inphut khat-um Jihudi ngai ileingaidonna inphut anasanring jei.”
Ama'n hiwahi angaidon pha, araming Mark inti John nu Mary inna aheiwa; khawakhan mi katam khatchu in-inchunna Pathian inleini.
Hanna Peter in tuoltiang innkhar khan arakhoongpha, Rhoda inti suok nungaak inkhat in kamalong aheiwa.
Ama'n Peter rasa eii ti ajetpha, arok-hiaiya innkharchu malongleiya, ama'n ataanna, Peter innkhar kuungnga angirra omjei tia ajuorilpi.
Khawakhan inmani'n amadiang inti, “Nang na-inweetjei!” Takkha ama'n kheella hiwahi kadiktak eii tia aleiril. Khawakhan inmani'n inti, “Hiwahi ama tirton eii.”
Takkha Peter in innkhar kha rakhoongnga aleiom, halli inmani'n innkhar kha inmalongpha, Peter kha inmuwa inleingakjei.

Takkha ama'n inmani kha omchian nasik akut zaap ah, Pumi in ama kha angtho-thoa mikhumna ah inphut iheikeisuome itikha inmani diang aleirilpijei. Halli ama'n ati, “Hiwahi James khat-um a-u-anai ngaidiang juorilpiru,” Khawa suoli ama'n asuok ah munkhattiang asijei.
Khuo hongwarpha Peter diang angme kasuokjei tia raalmingai karra inhaangna asuokjei.
Halli Herod in ama entoknasik chong aleipeii, takkha inmumak pha, akangaak ngaikha ama'n chong rakella, inmani kha thatnasik-ah chong aleipejei.

Herod in Tyre khat-um Sidon mi ngaidiang aleiraang thei, khawa jarra inmani'n ininchunna ama inmupui inleisi, ma-insakhet ah reng innsuung ka-ensuipa Blastus kha inmani kasansik ah amalung-inminthuulla, Herod diang inmani'n kadai kahoiya omnasik kani inleisi, ajarchu inmani rengpa ramma inphut bakle-in inleimuwa eii.
Herod in ikadang nikhuo inkhat khan areng puondiar athoa, chongtanna munkhan in-ongnga, inmani diang chong aleiril.
Halli mi ngaikhan inhongkheek ah, “pathian rasa eii, mi rasa emak!” inti.
Herod in Pathian kha kayamak jarra khawa phatak khan Pumi tirton in amakha awuok purra, ralung ngai'n ama kha in-eiya halli athijei.
Takkha Pathian chongchu insoonna khat-um loktirra asi.
Barnabas khat-um Saul in inchuon inminhek ah, Mark inti John kha inmanile inruoiya Jerusalemma inphut inheikirjei.
